mapper.sql: interface_id interfaceId, request_id requestId, request_data requestData, request_result requestResult, request_message requestMessage, feedback_status feedbackStatus
mapper.insert: insert into sys_interface ( interface_id, request_id, request_data, request_result, request_message, feedback_status, create_date, create_user, modify_date, modify_user ) values ( #{interfaceId}, #{requestId}, #{requestData}, #{requestResult}, #{requestMessage}, #{feedbackStatus}, #{createDate}, #{createUser}, #{modifyDate}, #{modifyUser} )
mapper.update:
update sys_interface
request_id = #{requestId},
request_data = #{requestData},
request_result = #{requestResult},
request_message = #{requestMessage},
feedback_status = #{feedbackStatus},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
modify_user = #{modifyUser}
and interface_id = #{interfaceId}
